string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_01
string.value: Face Recognition is a biometric identification technology that allows your phone to recognize the features of your face. It uses the front camera to capture facial data, and then compares it to pre-stored data to quickly verify your identity. You can use this feature to unlock your device, open locked apps, and more.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_02
string.value: Please note the following when setting up this feature:

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_03
string.value: 1.Make sure that the camera lens is clean.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_04
string.value: 2.Scan your face in a well-lit environment, avoiding direct sunlight.；

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_05
string.value: 3.Avoid covering your face with items of clothing, hair, sunglasses, masks, or thick makeup.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_06
string.value: 4.Make sure your face is completely displayed in the frame. Look straight at the camera, and avoid raising and lowering your head or closing your eyes.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_07
string.value: 5.Make sure that no one else appears in the frame.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_08
string.value: Please note the following when using Face Recognition:

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_09
string.value: 1.Face Recognition may not work as well in dim, very bright, or backlit environments, or if the angle between your face and the camera is too great.

string.name: face_announce_tip1_item2_3d
string.value: 2.Face Recognition is less secure than other unlock methods such as Pattern, PIN, and Password.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_10
string.value: There is a small chance that your device may be unlocked by people that closely resemble you or by objects that represent close depictions of your likeness.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_11
string.value: To prevent Face Recognition from being used without your consent, please exercise caution before allowing other people to use your device.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_12
string.value: The functionality of Face Recognition may also be affected in scenarios other than those described above.

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_14_2
string.value: is rigorously protected. This data is encrypted and stored in an isolated zone on your device, where it will not be copied by Huawei, and cannot be copied or accessed by any app. When you use Face Recognition in an app, the app is only informed whether or not verification is successful, and cannot access your actual

string.name: face_recognize_announce_message_15_2
string.value: , you are entitled to decide how you use the Face Recognition feature. For example, if you don't want to use Face Recognition to access App Lock, you can disable this feature in Settings. You can also choose to permanently delete your。

string.name: face_3drecognize_announce_message_01
string.value: 3D Face Recognition uses depth-sensing technology to create a sophisticated, three-dimensional model of your face, which can be used to verify your identity. This lets you securely unlock your device, confirm payments, and access features such as App Lock and Safe by simply looking at the screen. 3D Face Recognition is more secure and robust than 2D face recognition technologies, and can even be used in the dark.

string.name: face_introdution_tip
string.value: Add an extra layer of security by only allowing this device to be unlocked with facial recognition when a trusted device is connected.

string.name: remove_device_tip
string.value: Once removed, a trusted device will no longer be required to unlock this device with facial recognition.

string.name: add_device_tip
string.value: You will only be able to unlock this device with facial recognition when a trusted device is connected over Bluetooth. Other unlock methods will not be affected.

string.name: open_bluetooth
string.value: Bluetooth must be enabled. Touch to enable

string.name: no_available_devices_tip
string.value: No paired devices found. Pair one now?

string.name: main_and_backup_faces
string.value: primary and secondary faces are set

string.name: trusted_device_be_connected_when_unlocking
string.value: A trusted device needs to be connected to unlock

string.name: recognize_without_opening_eyes
string.value: When screen reading is turned on, it can be recognized without opening your eyes

string.name: looking_for_other_settings
string.value: Are you looking for its settings？

string.name: whether_to_enable_safe
string.value: You need to open the application file management safe to complete the face association. Whether to enable?

string.name: Whether_to_activate_app_lock
string.value: The app lock function needs to be turned on to complete the face association. Activate App Lock now?

string.name: wether_delete_face_data
string.value: After deletion, features based on facial data will not be available. delete or not?

string.name: face_3dguide_info_2
string.value: Face Recognition verifies your identity based on your facial features. To learn more, see the

string.name: face_inform_open_applock_msg
string.value: App Lock is not enabled. Enable now?

string.name: face_recognize_unlock_summary_3d
string.value: Unlock directly after successful facial recognition.

string.name: face_recognize_slideunlock_summary_3d
string.value: Slide to unlock after successful facial recognition.

string.name: face_fingerprint_settings_switch_summary
string.value: Usernames and passwords are accessed from Password Vault.

string.name: enroll_backup_face_summary
string.value: Add another appearance for accurate facial recognition even if you change your look.

string.name: face_inform_open_strongbox_msg
string.value: The Safe feature hasn\'t been enabled yet.

string.name: face_guide_2d_way
string.value: Before starting, make sure the camera is clean, your face is unobstructed, and the environment is well-lit.

string.name: face_guide_2d_announce
string.value: You can use Face Recognition to unlock your device and open locked apps.Click "Start typing" to indicate your consent

string.name: face_guide_3d_way
string.value: First, position your face in the frame. Then slowly move your head in a circle while looking at the screen to show all angles of your face.

string.name: face_guide_3d_announce
string.value: You can use Face Recognition to unlock your device, confirm payments, open locked apps, and more.Click "Start typing" to indicate your consent

string.name: face_enroll_too_left
string.value: Face too far to the left

string.name: face_enroll_too_right
string.value: Face too far to the right

string.name: face_rotate_too_left
string.value: Too much head to the left

string.name: face_rotate_too_high
string.value: Head raised at too high an Angle

string.name: face_rotate_too_right
string.value: Head turned too far to the right
